name: Dies Irae: Amantes Amentes - Act II: Nihil Difficile Amanti (Kei & Rea Scenario)
summary: Ren Fujii, a young man attending high school in Suwahara City, finds his friendship with his old buddy Shirou Yusa shatter to pieces following a certain incident, ending in a vicious fight that sees Ren hospitalized for two months. he season shifts from autumn to winter - to the dawning weeks of December, with Christmas on the horizon.
